member.name: T:LAIR.IO.HashSearchTextStream
member.summary: Represents a text stream, the lines of which can be searched with a hashing search algorithm. In the hashing search algorithm, each line is mapped to a hash code. The hash code for a line is mapped to the line's position in the file. To check whether a line is present, one need only compute the hash of the queried line and read the file at the given position. Because of hash collisions, one might need to read multiple lines.
